Are you looking for stylish, sustainable fashion? Try out SHADE, your ultimate sustainable shopping companion. üåü

üíª Add to Chrome: Click the button above and pin the extension to your toolbar for easy access.

üîç Product Search: Instead of text-based search, use visual AI to find sustainable alternatives that match the style you're after. Simply click on an image and let SHADE do the rest.

üëó Product Discovery: Browse over 70,000 sustainable pieces from brands rated 'Good' and Great' by Good On You; the world's leading source for fashion brand ratings.

This marks the initial version of SHADE! Huge thanks to our early users and brands for their invaluable help in bringing this to life. We're always iterating, so feel free to contact us at hello@shadyclub.com or check out www.shadyclub.com to share your feedback and ideas for the upcoming version!

About Us:
SHADE is being developed by SHADY.CLUB, a fashion AI startup founded entirely by fierce women to make sustainability more accessible. From the founders: "You can rock style and sustainability without compromise; numerous brands are devoted to sustainably crafting the latest-in-fashion, even in the fast fashion realm. These brands lack the resources to rival big retailers and deserve more visibility. The aim of SHADE is to get their products in front of shoppers and a fair shot at tackling greenwashing."

Disclaimers:
1. While we appreciate that Google warns users about how extensions work, please note that this is a standard warning. SHADE does not read and change all your data on websites. For more details on data collection and usage, refer to our privacy policy at: https://www.shadyclub.com/privacy-policy
2. You might see a caution message when downloading the extension. This is because we're new on the Chrome store and not yet recognised as active developers.
3. SHADY.CLUB is not accountable for the accuracy of Good On You‚Äôs brand sustainability ratings and data. Explore more about their ratings at: www.goodonyou.eco/how-we-rate/
